descriptor.name: INSPIRE Fellowship Application Advisor
descriptor.short_desc: A guide for top-ranking students and INSPIRE scholars on applying for the prestigious DST INSPIRE Fellowship for their doctoral research.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module provides an in-depth guide to the prestigious 'Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE) Fellowship' from the Department of Science and Technology (DST). Agents will learn to guide top-tier candidates through the competitive application process for securing a full-time Ph.D. fellowship in India.

  1. Fellowship Package & Duration:
    Understand the comprehensive financial support, including the five-year tenure with upgradation from JRF to SRF, House Rent Allowance (HRA) as per GoI norms, and an annual contingency grant of â‚¹20,000.
  2. Strict Eligibility Criteria:
    Master the specific eligibility requirements, focusing on University 1st Rank Holders at the PG level (or Graduate/PG in Medicine) and INSPIRE Scholars with a minimum of 70% marks.
  3. Competitive Selection Process:
    Learn about the nature of the competitive selection process, where a Subject Expert Committee (SEC) evaluates applications based on academic merit, the research proposal, and the supervisor's credentials.

Why Take This Course:

  • Assist the brightest minds in the country to secure funding for their doctoral research.
  • Specialize in a flagship central government scheme aimed at strengthening India's S&T base.
  • Become a key resource for university students aspiring to a career in science and research.

descriptor.name: National Science Education & Research Council
descriptor.short_desc: Dedicated to promoting scientific research and facilitating access to national fellowships and grants.
descriptor.long_desc: The National Science Education & Research Council is committed to nurturing scientific talent in India by providing clear and comprehensive guidance on applications for major government research funding opportunities like the INSPIRE Fellowship.
